sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Creates a new virtual cloud network (VCN).

Inputs :

  • Compartment ID -The OCID of the compartment to contain the VCN.
  • CIDR Block -The CIDR IP address block of the VCN.
  • Display Name - A user-friendly name.
  • DNS Label -A DNS label for the VCN.
  • Free Form Tags -Free-form tags for this resource.
  • IPv6 CIDR Block -IPv6 for the VCN.
  • Is IPv6 Enabled -Whether IPv6 is enabled for the VCN.

Outputs :

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error, along with code. Populated only when an error occurs.
  • CIDR Block -The CIDR IP address block of the VCN.
  • Compartment ID -The OCID of the compartment contains the VCN.
  • Defined Tags -Defined tags for this resource.
  • Dhcp Options ID -The OCID for the VCN's default set of DHCP options.
  • Display Name -The display name of VCN.
  • Free Form Tags -Free-form tags for this resource.
  • Lifecycle State -The VCN's current state.
  • Network ID -The OCID for VCN.
  • Route Table ID -The OCID for the VCN's default route table.
  • Security ID -The OCID for the VCN's default security list.
  • Time Created -The date and time the VCN was created.

Error Messages :

  • Bad Request.
  • Unauthorized.
  • Not Found.
  • Internal Server Error.

To use this action, the corresponding Oracle connection and credential must be created and associated with the Oracle Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Creates a new virtual cloud network (VCN).

Inputs :

  • Compartment ID -The OCID of the compartment to contain the VCN.
  • CIDR Block -The CIDR IP address block of the VCN.
  • Display Name - A user-friendly name.
  • DNS Label -A DNS label for the VCN.
  • Free Form Tags -Free-form tags for this resource.
  • IPv6 CIDR Block -IPv6 for the VCN.
  • Is IPv6 Enabled -Whether IPv6 is enabled for the VCN.

Outputs :

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error, along with code. Populated only when an error occurs.
  • CIDR Block -The CIDR IP address block of the VCN.
  • Compartment ID -The OCID of the compartment contains the VCN.
  • Defined Tags -Defined tags for this resource.
  • Dhcp Options ID -The OCID for the VCN's default set of DHCP options.
  • Display Name -The display name of VCN.
  • Free Form Tags -Free-form tags for this resource.
  • Lifecycle State -The VCN's current state.
  • Network ID -The OCID for VCN.
  • Route Table ID -The OCID for the VCN's default route table.
  • Security ID -The OCID for the VCN's default security list.
  • Time Created -The date and time the VCN was created.

Error Messages :

  • Bad Request.
  • Unauthorized.
  • Not Found.
  • Internal Server Error.

To use this action, the corresponding Oracle connection and credential must be created and associated with the Oracle Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
